entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
